certification.value: Rated R for language and prison violence

synopsis.value: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for intense sequences of violence and some menace

synopsis.value: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.

certification.value: Rated R for language, some sexuality and actuality violence

synopsis.value: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title.value: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

synopsis.value: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

certification.value: Rated R for strong graphic violence and drug use, pervasive strong language and some sexuality

synopsis.value: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title.value: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for intense epic battle sequences and frightening images

synopsis.value: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title.value: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for epic battle sequences and some scary images

synopsis.value: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for some intense perilous action and brief strong language.

synopsis.value: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in an attempt to find a potentially habitable planet that will sustain humanity.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for drug content, some sensuality and war violence

synopsis.value: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for sequences of violence and action throughout

synopsis.value: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title.value: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

certification.value: Rated PG for sci-fi action violence

synopsis.value: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

title.value: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

synopsis.value: Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.

title.value: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for epic battle sequences and scary images

synopsis.value: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

certification.value: Rated R for disturbing and graphic depiction of violent anti-social behavior, sexuality and language

synopsis.value: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

title.value: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

certification.value: Rated PG for sci-fi violence and brief mild language

synopsis.value: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

certification.value: Rated R for sci-fi violence and brief language

synopsis.value: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

certification.value: Rated R for strong brutal violence, sexuality, drug content and language

synopsis.value: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

certification.value: Rated R for grisly afterviews of horrific and bizarre killings, and for strong language

synopsis.value: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

certification.value: Rated R for violence and a substantial amount of strong language

synopsis.value: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

title.value: Once Upon a Time in the West

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for western violence and brief sensuality

synopsis.value: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.
An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.

certification.value: Rated R for scenes of strong graphic violence, and for language

synopsis.value: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, who is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for holocaust-related thematic elements

synopsis.value: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.
Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.
The Tramp struggles to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.
Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

synopsis.value: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

certification.value: Rated R for intense prolonged realistically graphic sequences of war violence, and for language

synopsis.value: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

certification.value: Rated PG for some scary moments

synopsis.value: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into beasts.

certification.value: Rated R for language and some drug use

synopsis.value: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.

certification.value: Rated R for strong sci-fi action and violence, and for language

synopsis.value: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son, John, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.
The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

certification.value: Rated R for violence, language and some drug content

synopsis.value: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent-film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.

certification.value: Rated R for violence, language and some sex-related material

synopsis.value: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

certification.value: Rated R for violence and brief strong language

synopsis.value: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

certification.value: Rated R for disturbing violent images, language, sexual content and some drug use

synopsis.value: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

certification.value: Rated PG for thematic elements, some violent content, sexual humor and mild language

synopsis.value: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.

certification.value: Rated R for strong brutal violence, pervasive language, some strong sexual content and drug material

certification.value: Rated R for intense, graphic combat

synopsis.value: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

A young man is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

certification.value: Rated R for sci-fi violence/gore and language

synopsis.value: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for violence and disturbing images

synopsis.value: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for intense sequences of violence and action, some sensuality and language

synopsis.value: When Bane, a former member of the League of Shadows, plans to continue the work of Ra's al Ghul, the Dark Knight is forced to return after an eight year absence to stop him.
Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

certification.value: Rated R for strong graphic violence throughout, a vicious fight, language and some nudity

synopsis.value: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.
A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.
Tricked into thinking that he caused the death of his own father, a young lion cub flees and abandons his destiny as the future king.
When soldiers in World War I refuse to continue with an impossible attack, their superior officers decide to make an example of them.
A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

certification.value: Rated R for strong sexuality, language, violence and drug content

synopsis.value: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

certification.value: Rated R for monster violence, and for language

synopsis.value: The planet from
(1979) has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?
Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.
Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.
A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

certification.value: Rated R for some war violence and brief language

synopsis.value: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

certification.value: Rated R for language including sexual references, and for teen drug and alcohol use

synopsis.value: The life of a young man, Mason, from age 5 to age 18.

certification.value: Rated R for strong violence including scenes of torture, sexuality and pervasive language

synopsis.value: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for images of violence and gore

synopsis.value: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.
A tragic film covering a young boy and his little sister's struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.

certification.value: Rated R for strong violence, sexual content, language and some drug use

synopsis.value: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

certification.value: Rated PG for sci-fi action violence

synopsis.value: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader shake off of the dark side of the Force.

certification.value: Rated R for strong violence and language

synopsis.value: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
An insurance rep lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

A mentally unstable Vietnam war veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

certification.value: Rated R for brutal medieval warfare

synopsis.value: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron fist.

synopsis.value: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

title.value: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

certification.value: Rated R for language, some drug and sexual content

synopsis.value: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

certification.value: Rated R for a scene of bloody violence, some strong sexual content/nudity, and language

synopsis.value: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.
Leonard Vole is arrested on suspicion of murdering an elderly acquaintance. He employs an experienced but aging barrister as his defense attorney.
Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.
A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the U.S.-Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.
In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.
A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

certification.value: Rated R for strong violence, language and some nudity

synopsis.value: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view.

title.value: Monty Python and the Holy Grail

synopsis.value: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.
An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.
Two bounty hunters with the same intentions, team up to track down a Western outlaw.
The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

certification.value: Rated R for strong violence and language, and for sexuality

synopsis.value: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

synopsis.value: A group of space criminals must work together to stop the fanatical villain Ronan the Accuser from destroying the galaxy.

synopsis.value: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

synopsis.value: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

synopsis.value: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

synopsis.value: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

synopsis.value: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

synopsis.value: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.

certification.value: Rated R for language, and violence, and for a scene of sexuality

synopsis.value: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.
An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.
A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.

certification.value: Rated PG for thematic material, brief violence and language

synopsis.value: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

synopsis.value: To avoid being taken away to a nursing home, an old widower tries to fly his home to Paradise Falls, South America, along with a boy scout who accidently lifted off with him.
In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.
Allied P.O.W.s plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

certification.value: Rated R for graphic violence and some language

synopsis.value: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.
A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the US Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for thematic material, some disturbing images and crude humor

synopsis.value: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

synopsis.value: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.
After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.
The Tramp goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.
An elderly lord abdicates to his three sons, and the two corrupt ones turn against him.
When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single handedly and straight through enemy lines.

A spoiled heiress, running away from her family, is helped by a man who's actually a reporter looking for a story.

A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title.value: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

synopsis.value: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.
A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

certification.value: Rated R for violence/cruelty, some nudity and brief sexuality

synopsis.value: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

certification.value: Rated R for some strong violence and language

synopsis.value: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history, and fulfill their mother's last wishes.
Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.
The wife of a cruel headmaster and his mistress conspire to kill him, but after the murder is committed, his body disappears, and strange events begin to plague the two women.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for some violence and drug content

synopsis.value: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

synopsis.value: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

synopsis.value: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).

When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
A poor Midwest family is forced off of their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

certification.value: Rated R for violence/gore, language and sexuality

synopsis.value: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.
Intensely touching story of a misunderstood young adolescent who left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.
A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

certification.value: Rated PG-13 for violence, some disturbing images, thematic material and language

synopsis.value: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
A drama based on the true story of a college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.

synopsis.value: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

synopsis.value: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

, the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

certification.value: Rated PG for some violence and tension

synopsis.value: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder...a theory that he plans to implement.
